<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1129749_to_do_0.activeUsers</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>activeUsers</name><script><![CDATA[var activeUsers = Class.create();
activeUsers.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	getActiveUser : function(){
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		gr.addActiveQuery();
		gr.query();
		
		while(gr.next()){
			return gr.user_name;
		}
	},

    type: 'activeUsers'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-07 14:02:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>ba041ee997b0061053f8b5a6f053af35</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>activeUsers</sys_name><sys_package display_value="TO-DO Application" source="x_1129749_to_do_0">59e1a10597a0021053f8b5a6f053af30</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="TO-DO Application">59e1a10597a0021053f8b5a6f053af30</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ba041ee997b0061053f8b5a6f053af35</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-07 14:02:20</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
